features: NON-GREASY, LIQUID MAKEUP REMOVER: Say buh-bye to the day’s makeup with e.l.f. SKIN’s Holy Hydration! e.l.f. Off Makeup Remover. The non-greasy feeling liquid makeup remover tackles stubborn and even waterproof makeup without harsh tugging or rubbing!

GENTLE FORMULA: Gentle enough for sensitive skin and contact lens wearers, this ophthalmologist-tested formula effortlessly melts away all traces of makeup from your eyes, lips, and face without irritation.
INFUSED WITH HYALURONIC ACID: Plus, it’s enriched with skin-loving hyaluronic acid, squalane, and niacinamide to leave your lashes and skin soothed and conditioned.
FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Great for normal, dry, oily & combination skin types.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% cruelty-free and Vegan.
body.description: Say buh-bye to the day’s makeup with e.l.f. SKIN’s Holy Hydration! e.l.f. Off Makeup Remover. The non-greasy feeling liquid makeup remover tackles stubborn and even waterproof makeup without harsh tugging or rubbing! Gentle enough for sensitive skin and contact lens wearers, this ophthalmologist-tested formula effortlessly melts away all traces of makeup from your eyes, lips, and face without irritation. Plus, it’s enriched with skin-loving hyaluronic acid, squalane, and niacinamide to leave your lashes and skin soothed and conditioned.Why You’ll Love It: • Easily dissolves all makeup (even waterproof!) without harsh tugging • Non-greasy feel, bi-phase formula • Formulated with hydrating and soothing ingredients • Safe for sensitive eyes and skin; non-irritating • Ophthalmologist-tested and safe for contact lens wearersKey Ingredients: • Hyaluronic Acid • Squalane • NiacinamideGreat For: Normal, Dry, Oily, and Combination Skin TypesAll e.l.f. products are proud to be 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and Leaping Bunny Certified. Because kindness is chic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is just as good as any expensive product. I wear contacts so I am sensitive to most eye makeup removers. Most leave a slight film on my eye and make it hard for me with my contacts. This takes off all my makeup and leaves my skin feeling fresh with no residue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Let me tell you, this make up remover works AMAZING. I have sensitive eyes when it comes to make up remover and this does not bother my eyes AT ALL! It doesn't leave your face oily afterwards but nice and refreshed feeling 😌. It gets my stubborn mascara off with no problems and with this price you honestly can't beat it. I normally get the Cetaphil sensitive one but this is my new go to. HIGHLY recommend!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great at removing eye makeup! But oily
reviews.reviewText: Love this...cruelty free elf eye makeup remover...lost one star because it's so oily. I wear eye contacts and have no problem using this even if it gets in my eye.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love ELF and this make up remover worked very nicely
reviews.reviewText: I love ELF and this make up remover worked very nicely without having to rub too much . It also does leave the skin hydrated but not greasy unlike a lot of other make up removers .definitely 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Elf and this product!
reviews.reviewText: I love Elf products! This one takes off my makeup so fast and easily and leaves my face so soft and hydrated!! Definitely recommend this product! Elf did it again! Can't beat the price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comparable to high-end brands
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this as a replacement to my high-end brand and it works just as great and gets my make up off just as good. It doesn’t leave my skin oily, which I love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It burns my eyes.
reviews.reviewText: It works but it burns my eyes after using it. I wash my eyes throughly and it still burns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Elf does it again with a great eye makeup remover. I've tried other brands including one very well known brand in a blue bottle that is very expensive. This brand is just as good minus the perfume which your eyes do not need. And you cannot beat the price. This is my go to now.
